name: Burst Fire
content:
Burst fire allows the use of a burst fire attack. A burst fire weapon will always have either the @Compendium[compendiums-mix-dnd5e.um5-weaponproperties.450g1kbvRQoe1x5P]{Auto / Auto-Heavy} property (and as such the burst fire property is not listed on the table). A burst fire attack sprays a 10-foot-cube area within normal range with ten rounds of ammunition. Each creature in the area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take the weapon's normal damage. The DC of burst fire attacks is either 15 or is equal to 8 + your Dexterity modifier + your proficiency bonus if proficient.
